settings.heading: ABOUT CHURCH
settings.description: God comes to us in free and undeserved favor in the person of Jesus Christ who lived, died, and rose for us that we might belong to God and serve Christ in the world. Following Jesus, Presbyterians are engaged in the world and in seeking thoughtful solutions to the challenges of our time.

settings.heading: OUR SERMONS
settings.description: God comes to us in free and undeserved favor in the person of Jesus Christ who lived, died, and rose for us that we might belong to God and serve Christ in the world. Following Jesus, Presbyterians are engaged in the world and in seeking thoughtful solutions to the challenges of our time.

settings.heading: KIDS FRIENDLY, PARENT APPROVED
settings.description: God comes to us in free and undeserved favor in the person of Jesus Christ who lived, died, and rose for us that we might belong to God and serve Christ in the world. Following Jesus, Presbyterians are engaged in the world and in seeking thoughtful solutions to the challenges of our time.

settings.heading: OUR MISSION
settings.description:
Our mission is what we do. The active verb here is invite. God progresses
through gracious invitations.

settings.heading: OUR Faith
settings.description:
All Peoples are of tremendous value to God; reaching them with the Gospel is
our distinct responsibility.

settings.heading: OUR Vision
settings.description:
We see our mission as extending God’s Kingdom and we seek to help every
member find their place.

settings.heading: OUR Values
settings.description:
Community is where we most deeply experience God’s love and grace
throughout all stages of life.
